Position Title: Quantity SurveyorEmployment Type: Full Time Salary: up to 5K AED all-inclusive, depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location: Sharjah, UAEAbout the Client: A well-established metalwork and engineering company with several renowned projects in UAEJob Description:Prepares construction budget by studying plans, updating specifications, identifying, and projecting costs for each elevation.
Obtains bids and negotiate prices from vendors and subcontractors by specifying materials, then evaluates offers to purchase by costing changes, additions, and site requirements.
Gathers opinion of the project team and fabrication team on the engineering details to prepare final controlled documents of tender.
Assist the Estimating Manager in all matters relating to the financial and contractual aspects of the project during the full design stages for the project.
Prepare BOQ's and Preamble for all types of Method of Measurement: Remeasure, Lump Sum, and EPC (Engineering, Procurement, and Construction).Skills
Skills:
Open to Pakistani, Indian, and Sri Lankan nationals
Male, 45 years old and below
Must have Bachelor's degree in Engineering
Minimum 5 years related experience from steel structure/construction
Exposure in steel fabrication and erection works
Experience in doing all types of contract and preparation: Remeasure, Lump Sum, and EPC (Engineering, Procurement, and Construction)
Candidates who can join immediately will be prioritized
